none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 15, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Bulldozing hardcore from Hungary with the subtlety of an earthquake. HELMET style churning riffs with suffocating crew backup vocals on the first track before they launch into the fast and meaty 'core that makes up the bulk of this 1997 tape. Breakdowns abound, and it's hard to describe how awesome the saxophone is in "Return To Sadness." BURNING INSIDE

seo.title: Burning Inside - Burning Inside demo 1997 - Terminal Escape
